data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Lanzhou, Gansu, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lanzhou, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 229,055 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Lanzhou, Gansu, China.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Lanzhou, Gansu, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Lanzhou, Gansu, China who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bonan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bonan people.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Lanzhou.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Lanzhou unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Lanzhou. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Lanzhou
location.cities_list: Lanzhou, Yongdeng Chengguanzhen, Gaolan Chengguanzhen, Yuzhong Chengguanzhen, Fulilu
